text:
Mantle's native token, $MNT, will empower builders of the ecosystem, not only serving as a way to decentralize Mantle but to keep it evergreen. 🌿

MNT use cases:
🎯 Stake $MNT to run a node
🎯 Pay transaction fees with $MNT
🎯 Utilize $MNT for voting
+ more.

#BuildonMantle https://t.co/gGpN0TJosT

text:
🧑‍⚖️ Judging Criteria

Submissions will be judged on creativity, quality of the content, and alignment with the Tweet criteria above.

parent.text:
📝 Tweet Criteria

1.  Must include: @0xMantle and #PlayonMantle
2. Must Quote Tweet the original video post (linked below)
3. Must contain a story written in a Twitter thread
4. At least one screenshot or image related to the original video (AI images are welcome!)

quoted_tweet.text:
The countdown has begun.

The first transmission reveals an amazing modular world packed with resources that upgrades by literally shifting the earth.

Share and comment 👇 for a chance to become one of the first citizens of Mantle. https://t.co/C668ERmn7j

text:
🌟 How to submit your Tweet

Option 1: Follow the Tweet Criteria above

Option 2: Submit your Tweet link on Zealy to earn xp for your submission!
https://t.co/1F0HZb64cS

Have fun and enjoy the Journey 🚀

#PlayonMantle

text:
🔴 The target delisting time of $BIT on spot markets and liquidity pools is by 4AM UTC on July 17.

🟢 The target listing time of $MNT of the same is at 10AM UTC on July 17.

♟️ Exchanges may determine at their own discretion the timings of other $BIT products they offer.

text: Draw 25 and #BuildonMantle 👀 https://t.co/YkdYSK8fxj

$BIT will be used for gas fees, staking and the ecosystem token on the @0xMantle network. 

All dApps on the network are built by the community. The internal team will not be building native dApps.

Stay safe $BIT community !

Live long and prosper 🖖

quoted_tweet.text:
Fam, we're excited to see all the new dApps being built on #Mantle Network! As the ecosystem grows, here's a reminder:

1. $BIT is Mantle's only token! Any token comprising "Mantle" are not officially issued by the network.
2. All dApps on Mantle are built by the community.
